privacyNotice.title: Privacy Notice
privacyNotice.intro: At Lion Systems, we are committed to protecting your personal data in accordance with the provisions of the Federal Law on Protection of Personal Data Held by Private Parties.

section1.title: 1. Data processing controller
section1.text: Lion Systems, located in Cuajimalpa de Morelos, Mexico City, will be responsible for the use, protection, and processing of your personal data.

section2.title: 2. Purposes of processing
section2.purpose3: Send updates, promotions, or related communications.

section3.title: 3. Means to exercise ARCO rights
section3.text: You can exercise your Access, Rectification, Cancellation, or Opposition (ARCO) rights by sending a request to the email: dleon55@hotmail.com.

section4.title: 4. Data transfer
section4.text: Your personal data will not be transferred to third parties without your consent, except for exceptions provided by law.

section5.title: 5. Changes to the privacy notice
section5.text: This notice may be updated periodically. Any modification will be published on this same site.
